column1: '''''Old Words and Names in the Shire''''' was a short treatise written by [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column2: Merry Brandybuck]] sometime after the [[War of the Ring]].  In this work Merry discussed the kinship with the language of the [[Rohirrim]] of such "shire-words" as ''[[mathom]]'' and old elements in place names.  This treatise was kept in the library of [[Bucklebury]].<ref>{{FR
